org.jcvi.jillion.assembly

Class DefaultScaffold

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.DefaultScaffold
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scaffold

    public final class DefaultScaffold
extends Object
implements Scaffold
    DefaultScaffold is a Scaffold implementation that stores all PlacedContigs data internally in various Maps and Sets.
    Author:
    dkatzel

      • createBuilder

        public static ScaffoldBuilder createBuilder(String id)
        Create a new ScaffoldBuilder instance. This instance will not yet have any contigs.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Scaffold to be built. This will be the value returned by Scaffold.getId().
        Returns:
        a new empty ScaffoldBuilder; never null.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Get a set of all the PlacedContigs in this scaffold.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a Set of PlacedContigs; will never be null and will only be empty if there are no contigs in this scaffold.

      • hasContig

        public boolean hasContig(String contigId)
        Does this scaffold contain a PlacedContig object with the given contig id?
        Specified by:
        hasContig in interface Scaffold
        Parameters:
        contigId - the contig id to check.
        Returns:

      • convertContigRangeToScaffoldRange

        public Range convertContigRangeToScaffoldRange(String placedContigId,
                                               Range placedContigRange)
        Converts contig range coordinates into scaffold range coordinates based on contig's scaffold location and orientation
        Specified by:
        convertContigRangeToScaffoldRange in interface Scaffold
        Parameters:
        placedContigId - target scaffold contig
        placedContigRange - contig coordinate range to convert of scaffold coordinates
        Returns:
        scaffold coordinates corresponding to input contig id/range values
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if scaffold does not contain target contig
        IllegalArgumentException - if target contig is not oriented in the forward or reverse direction or if the range to be converted is not a subrange of the scaffold's placed contig
